description: "Take your Body Where Your Mind Wants to Go" and where the sun is shining, the Mental Health Heavyweight T-Shit will give you the much needed comfort you need to keep chugging along. Life can get hectic sometimes, and stepping away from the chaos of everyday is sometimes exactly what we need to soothe our souls. Throw on this soft cotton tee, pack your bags or your daypack, and take a trip out the door to reset, rejuvenate, and explore the beauty and solitude of the world around you. From a sunny mid-day walk in the park to an impromptu solo sunset mission, it's the little things that can make a big impact.
name: Marmot Mental Health Heavyweight Tee SS - Unisex
